T = int(raw_input())
for x in range(0, T):
    votes = 0
    V = int(raw_input())
    LV = {}
    cnt = 0
    for y in range(0, V):
        s = raw_input().split()
        if s[0] in LV:
            if LV[s[0]] == '-':
                cnt += 1
            else:
                cnt -= 1
        if s[1] == '-':
            cnt -= 1
        else:
            cnt += 1
        LV[s[0]] = s[1]
    print cnt
